Texts.Eng: Bring ^red;Kevin, your overlord^reset; 200 ^orange;Baby Heads on Sticks^reset;
Many thanks, Lester. This time I have an ^orange;honestly good^reset; thing for you! Promise!

You ever wonder how many ^orange;baby heads^reset; you can fit in a refrigerator? I do! Let's find out, shall we? If you were to gather say...200 ^orange;baby heads on sticks^reset; I'd be ever so thankful.
